name: Chaotic Cursor Crisis
description:
Hey there! Long time no see... This might be the first game jam game under a new company in a year. Hopefully I have been forgiven for my past mistakes...  The internet has been going around with rage games like Getting Over It, Stick with It and a game called Cursor Chaos. So I thought and do my part and give a rage game too, just that you guys can go crazy with it..... This version of the cursor dodge is more  juicier with art from best of both worlds- Pixel and Vector.... The rules are very simple- 1. Protect your cursor from 15 levels of increasing difficulty ranging from a few   enemies to complete bullet hell.  2. You have 1 life. When you die, the whole game restarts.  The web build is available to play, but just for fun, I have ported it to Windows, Mac and Linux with Android Build coming soon after the jam... The install is as follows- Install instructions
  • Download .zip file
  • Place in a folder on you desktop
  • Right click > Extract Here
  • Click on the application-Chaotic Cursor Crisis
  •  Sit back & get crazy
If you have problems, or you're on MAC / LINUX / VIRUS WARNING, comment in the jam comments or on this game main page

Note-(THIS ISN'T A GODDAMN SEQUEL TO LOGIC GATEKEEPER!!!!!) Credits Music- Main Title music is "Inceptive-Action", from a Newgrounds user. In-game music is "Boundless", from another Newgrounds user. Art by Metroid Games using Piskel Coding by Metroid Games Made in 3 days for the 100th Mini Jam- Overload Limitation- Chaos is everything (Congrats to  ZahranW, KingW for achieving this Game Jam milestone)
